knimeNode.name: Standings
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query league standings/tables from the Football API

intro.p: Queries league standings (league table/rankings) from the Football API for a specific league and season. Returns the complete table with team rankings, points, matches played, wins/draws/losses, goals, and form.
The node takes reference data as input to populate league and season selections. This is one of the simplest query nodes - it only requires league and season parameters.

fullDescription.option: Select the league to query standings for. Populated from reference data input.
Select the season year. Populated from reference data input.

ports.inPort: API-Sports connection from the API-Connector node
Reference data (leagues, seasons) from the Reference Data Loader node
ports.outPort: Table containing league standings with columns: Rank, Team_ID, Team_Name, Points, Played, Win, Draw, Lose, Goals_For, Goals_Against, Goal_Difference, Form, Description
